text.author: Michael Laverty, Chris Littel
text.title: An Entrepreneurial Mindset in Your Discipline or Field
text.summary: An entrepreneurial mindset creates new ideas and challenges established models in the industry, as in the example of a crop vacuum used to remove insects from crops, or Airbnb's disruption of the hotel industry with the idea of renting out people's unused rooms.
